Name: Brooklyn's Finest
Ingredients: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A delicately spiced riff on the classic Brooklyn cocktail .
History: Created in 2016 by Seth Brammer at Filament in Dallas, Texas, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Brooklyn's Finest contains 185 calories
